greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: E.g.f.: Sum_{n>=0} Product_{k=1..n} cosh(k*x).
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..234
mathematica: nn=20; tab = ConstantArray[0,nn]; tab[[1]] = Series[Cosh[x],{x,0,nn}]; Do[tab[[k]] = Series[tab[[k-1]]*Cosh[k*x],{x,0,nn}],{k,2,nn}]; Flatten[{1,Table[kk!*Sum[Coefficient[tab[[k]],x^kk],{k,1,kk}],{kk,1,nn}]}] (* more efficient *)
program: (PARI) {a(n)=local(X=x+x*O(x^n), Egf); Egf=sum(m=0, n, prod(k=1, m, cosh(k*X))); n!*polcoeff(Egf, n)}
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 04 2014
